text: Hagi, havere erivakakino krente'nea avompinti fri'zana avareno neazamofo eri'zamo masa'ane e'ne. Hu'negu Israeli vahe'mo'za, Zamavuginki hige'za Mosesena avugosafina onke'naze. Na'ankure masazamo avugosafintira remsa hige'za nonkageno, ana msamo'a akoheno avugosafintira resu hu'ne.  (Diu-Kas 35)
